name: photoconductor
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a substance that allows an electrical current to move more easily through it after light shines on it: The latest devices use a different type of photoconductor. Selenium is a much more sensitive photoconductor than sulphur.
More examplesFewer examplesThe great advance in copying technology came when they exposed a photoconductor to an electrostatic charge.We often had to replace the photoconductor unit in the laser printer.They measured the X-ray pulse with a diamond photoconductor.
